Description: Width, in characters, of the field when displayed in a user interface.
Height, in characters, of the field when displayed in a user interface.
Use this option if this attribute value must be set to some value - if, in other words, it must not be blank.
Defines whether element takes locale specification.
Use this option if this attribute value can be used for sorting of search results.
Use this option if the attribute value can be used in search forms.
Use this option if the attribute value can be used for display in search results.
Layout for value when used in a display. Element code tags prefixed with the ^ character, used to represent the value in the template. For example: ^my_element_code.
OSM URL for tileserver to load custom tiles from, with placeholders for X, Y and Z values in the format ${x}. .
Display name for layer containing tiles loaded from tile server specified in the tile server URL setting.
Include layer switching controls in the map interface.
